title: 115A.195 OWNERSHIP; AGREEMENTS TO MANAGE FACILITY.
text: The stabilization and containment facility developed under sections 115A.18 to 115A.30 may be wholly owned by the state or jointly owned by the state and a developer selected by the agency under section 115A.192. The commissioner may negotiate and the agency may enter agreements with a selected developer providing terms and conditions for the development and operation of the facility. If the agreements provide for capital improvements or equipment, or for payment of state money, the agreements may be implemented only if funds are appropriated and available to the agency for those purposes.
